doc:
Christopher Hassall https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Christopher_Hassall 0 Christopher Vernon Hassall (24 March 1912 – 25 April 1963) was an English actor, dramatist, librettist, lyricist and poet, who found his greatest fame in a memorable musical partnership with the actor and composer Ivor Novello after working together in the same touring company. He was also a noted biographer of Rupert Brooke (1964, Faber and Faber) and Edward Marsh (1958, James Tait Black Memorial Prize 1959). Christopher_Vernon_Hassall ( 24_March_1912 – 25_April_1963 ) was an_English_actor , dramatist , librettist , lyricist_and_poet , who found his_greatest_fame in a_memorable_musical_partnership with the_actor_and_composer_Ivor_Novello after working together in the_same_touring_company . He was also a_noted_biographer of Rupert_Brooke_(_1964 , Faber and Faber_) and Edward_Marsh_(_1958 , James_Tait_Black_Memorial_Prize_1959_) .
